com.liferay.apio.architect.error

Class APIError

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.liferay.apio.architect.error.APIError

  • @ProviderType
public class APIError
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes an API error. Instances of javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException and its descendants are converted to APIError . All other exceptions are converted to a 500 error with a standard message.

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getDescription()
        Returns the API error's description, if present; Optional#empty() otherwise.
        Returns:
        the API error's description, if present; Optional#empty() otherwise

      • getException

        public java.lang.Exception getException()
        Returns the API error's original exception.
        Returns:
        the API error's original exception

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        Returns the API error's message. This method can be used to get a meaningful message for logging purposes.
        Returns:
        the API error's message

      • getStatusCode

        public int getStatusCode()
        Returns the API error's HTTP status code.
        Returns:
        the API error's HTTP status code

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Returns the API error's title. This value is the same for all API errors of the same type.
        Returns:
        the API error's title

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Returns the API error's type. Note that this is different from the API error's exception. For example, if the API error's exception is NotAuthorizedException, an implementation of this method could return "not-authorized".
        Returns:
        the API error's type
